about_the_game:
The complete original soundtrack for your adventure in the land of the gods, now available exclusively on Steam!
There are 63 tracks that tell the full story of your travel to Kamigami's universe with it's breathtaking battles and non-stop action.

It has all versions of the songs used in the game and exclusive bonus tracks available in MP3 320kbps!
